question: Can I make dua in english, when in sajdah in Nafli salaat { Salaatul Hajaat}
answer:
QUESTION
I make salaatul hajaat salaat when need arises, Can I make dua in sajdah in Salaatul hajaat in English ?
ANSWER


Share:
It is not permissible to make Du?aa in any other language besides Arabic in the Sajda of any Salaat.

You may make any du?aa established from the Ahaadith and Qur?aan only in the Sajda of Nafl Salaat. (Fataawa Mahmoodiyah vol.16 pg.324)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
